articles.title: The monitor of the year 2019
articles.summary: <t>This monitor has been selected as the best monitor of 2019! Read the full article to get to know the futuristic features it offers.
articles.article:
<t>It's good. Like really. 1920x1080px, that's like milions of pixels, you can't even count them all. You can't see them. How better could it be?
<brt>You might say that it looks old and used, but the truth is that it is even older and useder than you thought! So it's got historical value. Who wouldn't want something like that...

articles.title: Best PC in the world!
articles.summary: <t>You might have seen the best monitor of 2019. Now get ready to behold the best personal computer ever built.

articles.title: Awesome new website
articles.summary:
<t>Tired of carrying around a paper with all the things you need to buy? Put an end to that now!
<bt>This awesome new website allows you to create your own shopping list! You can even use it with your friends and family to coordinate your shopping activities.
articles.article:
<t>No more lost shopping lists, no more forgetting what to buy. Shopping list by ruzicrom solves all your problems and troubles when it comes to shopping.
<brt>Forgot to tell your husband to buy milk? Just add it to the shopping list. Forgot to tell your child to buy some vegetable? Just add it to the shopping list! Forgot to tell your parents to buy drinks for your birthday? Just add it to the shopping!!
<brt>Start using an online shopping list today. Click <url>http://wa.toad.cz/~ruzicrom/semestralni_prace/homepage.php</url> for more information.
articles.image_description: A screenshot of a website. There is a basket filled with fresh food.
